accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the multi-agent system.

completeness.description: The extent to which the multi-agent system addressed all components of the question.

efficiency.description: The number of steps taken to arrive at a solution relative to an optimal process.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical steps the multi-agent system took to solve the question.

data_contamination_avoidance.description: Ensuring the answer is free from internet-based data contamination.

resource_utilization.description: How well the multi-agent system utilized its available resources (agents, information, etc.).
